text: Maria Perego (8 December 1923 â€“ 7 November 2019) was an Italian animation artist. She was known as the creator of the character Topo Gigio in 1959 with her husband Federico Caldura. She was born in Venice. Perego died on 7 November 2019 in Milan at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian artists Category:Animators Category:People from Venice
title: Maria Perego
